name: Bane of Dawn
description:
Bane of Dawn is a 3d pixel horror game made by DarrellL. You play in first person and have to escape without being injured by the creature wandering around.

WARNING: This game contains horror elements , flashing lights and jump scares.

Play at your own risk !

Please note that this game may be very short ! (10 - 15 min.)

But more content will be added soon.

Claim your free copy now. You can keep it even when the full game is out !

Chapter 1 : The last floor is out now, so make sure to check out my YouTube channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW4hA1-apyloBr7UrXh53EA

Also don't forget to follow , so you never miss any new & exiting updates!

_______

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Sprint - Left Shift

Pickup - Automatic (Walk over object)

When you die : Press any key to continue

________

Tips:

  • Keep an eye on your stamina (bottom left side on your screen). Don't waste stamina , you will need it. Stamina will refill 4 times faster if you don't move.
  • Watch out for red light
  • Your environment can change. Check every wall twice.
  • Be careful when running into a dead end. There is no way out.

Good luck !
